title: The green circle which show the ultimate
body:
I am wondering if it could be more interesting and easier for teamfight if we add a timer to the green circle instead of an insta-green. I mean it could be a lot easier for people to know if it is wondering to engage or not a teamfight. 
    It would be differents colors which means different status, orange if the ult is loading (just black before level 6) then green with a little animation or effect when the ultimate is ready, then if you're oom the circle would be blue and the form could be like a clock.
    Even if it would be useless in party group but in SoloQ i mean YoloQ, you can't really both speak and play, it would be interesting to have information by ourselves than asking him just front of a teamfight.

Btw I am sorry if my english is not so correct, I tried on the french forum, people approved but I need a larger people to agree in order to react Riot about my proposition.

I did a screen of what it could looks like. (I did not add the color on my screen, the idea of color is assigned to the french community).
Thx for reading.

Simple is almost always better when it comes to UI.  While I do think using quarter increments of a green/black circle could work, I also think it wouldn't be particularly easy to see.  You really want something that's going to pop out.  There are others that have recommended different colors, I think that's a step in the right direction.  As long as you can easily identify the ultimate status indicator with your peripheral vision, I think it doesn't matter how it works, although I agree with your original point that it would be nice if there was some way to tell how much longer until the ability is up.
Yes please.
